items.title: Milestone Packages
items.description:
_All Packages Include_

5 Hour Event Time, Two Hour Access Window Prior to Event Start, Served Champagne & Sparkling Cider Toast, Customized Room Setup, Choice of White or Ivory Linens for all Tables, Selection of Napkin Color(s), All China, Glassware & Flatware, Complimentary Parking for all Guests, and Uniformed, Professional Staff_._
